definitions.definition: a rude way to refer to somebody who you think is very stupid

examples.text: When I lost my passport, I felt such an idiot.
She was grinning like an absolute idiot.
He's made a complete idiot of himself over this woman!
I felt like a complete idiot, standing there in front of all those people!
He knew he was acting like an idiot.
What stupid idiot left their shoes on the stairs?
I just stood there like an idiot with my mouth open.
I realized I was dealing with a bunch of idiots.

definitions.definition: a word for a person with very low intelligence that is now considered offensive

wordOrigin: Middle English (denoting a person of low intelligence): via Old French from Latin idiota ‘ignorant person’, from Greek idiōtēs ‘private person, layman, ignorant person’, from idios ‘own, private’.
